creator: gjfdh@yahoo.com
text:
The man page for COPY doesn't make it clear that two or more <filterset>s can 
be used at once.  Adding an example which uses <filterset> with properties and 
another <filterset> with a filterfile would better illustrate the advanced 
function of copy/filtersets.

Second, the man page talks about "global build-file filters".  There should be 
some hypertext link to a description of these.
